summary: An improved and expanded version of manaflow\'s \"Potions Animated\", this mod plays a short animation whenever you drink a potion or beverage. It\'s far more believable than quaffing potions instantly. Improvements over the original are listed in the full description.
descriptionHtml:
An improved and expanded version of manaflow\'s \"Potions Animated\", this mod plays a short animation whenever you drink a potion or beverage. It\'s far more believable than quaffing potions instantly. Improvements over the original include the following:

- The 1st-person and 3rd-person animations now take the same amount of time (just under four seconds).

- Drinking no longer forces you out of the inventory, but rather queues animations to play when you return to normal gameplay.

- The weapon on your back can no longer become visible during the 1st-person animation.

- The animation is played not only for potions, but for beverages as well. (You can disable animations for beverages with the console command \"set AnimateBeverages to 0\" and re-enable it with \"set AnimateBeverages to 1\".)

- The mod has been tested, and bugs have been fixed, for as many different contingencies as possible (e.g. drinking while riding, drinking while looting, drinking while ragdolling--not that responsible adults do any of those things).

This mod does make Alchemy somewhat less useful compared to Restoration. I\'ve implemented fixes for this in a separate \"Alchemy Refinements\" mod ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35649]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35649[/url]).

This mod can also be found on Steam Workshop at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=138658318]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=138658318[/url].

If you find any bugs or issues, please note them in the comments so I can promptly address them.
author: David Sid
